properties.name: VendorRef
properties.description: The ID of the vendor who the bill is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: Line
properties.description: Individual line item of a transaction

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Monetary amount of the line item

properties.name: Description
properties.description: Textual description of the line item

properties.name: itemId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: LineNum
properties.description: Position of the line item relative to others

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The ID of the bill to delete

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: The condition for selecting bills. See the guide for supported syntax.

properties.name: billId
properties.description: The ID of the bill to update

properties.name: displayName
properties.description: The display name of the customer to create

properties.name: customerId
properties.description: The ID of the customer to update

properties.name: employeeId
properties.description: The ID of the employee to update

properties.name: CustomerRef
properties.description: The ID of the customer who the estimate is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: TaxCodeRef
properties.displayName: Tax Code Ref Name or ID
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: download
properties.description: Whether to download the estimate as a PDF file

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: Name of the file that will be downloaded

properties.name: estimateId
properties.description: The ID of the estimate to send

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email of the recipient of the estimate

properties.name: invoiceId
properties.description: The ID of the invoice to send

properties.name: TotalAmt
properties.description: Total amount of the transaction

properties.name: paymentId
properties.description: The ID of the payment to send

properties.name: purchaseId
properties.description: The ID of the purchase to retrieve

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Columns to return

properties.name: customer
properties.description: Customer to filter results by. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: dateRangeCustom
properties.description: Start date of the date range to filter results by

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: End date of the date range to filter results by

properties.name: date_macro
properties.description: Predefined date range to filter results by

properties.name: dateRangeCreationCustom
properties.description: Start date of the account creation date range to filter results by

properties.name: end_createdate
properties.description: End date of the account creation date range to filter results by

properties.name: createdate_macro
properties.description: Predefined report account creation date range

properties.name: dateRangeDueCustom
properties.description: Start date of the due date range to filter results by

properties.name: end_duedate
properties.description: End date of the due date range to filter results by

properties.name: duedate_macro
properties.description: Predefined due date range to filter results by

properties.name: dateRangeModificationCustom
properties.description: Start date of the account modification date range to filter results by

properties.name: end_moddate
properties.description: End date of the account modification date range to filter results by

properties.name: moddate_macro
properties.description: Predefined account modifiction date range to filter results by

properties.name: department
properties.description: Department to filter results by. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: docnum
properties.description: Transaction document number to filter results by

properties.name: group_by
properties.description: Transaction field to group results by

properties.name: memo
properties.description: Memo to filter results by. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: payment_Method
properties.description: Payment method to filter results by

properties.name: printed
properties.description: Printed state to filter results by

properties.name: qzurl
properties.description: Whether Quick Zoom URL information should be generated

properties.name: sort_by
properties.description: Column to sort results by

properties.name: source_account_type
properties.description: Account type to filter results by

properties.name: term
properties.description: Term to filter results by. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: bothamount
properties.description: Monetary amount to filter results by

properties.name: transaction_type
properties.description: Transaction type to filter results by

properties.name: vendor
properties.description: Vendor to filter results by. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
